casebody.data:
STATE
v.
SHARPE. No. COA07-978. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed April 15, 2008. Certification Date May 5, 2008. Appeal from Rockingham (99CRS13151, 99CRS13154, 99CRS13156, 00CRS1093, 00CRS1096, 00CRS2690, 00CRS2692, 02CRS52655).

Cases reported without published opinion. Affirmed; remanded for correction of clerical error in the written judgment and commitment in file number 99CRS13156.
